Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: That is a great question, and no. We are still working with attorneys and investment bankers to get the structure exactly right, but the way it works is (this is just an example) we set a price of $100 to start a TIF. Let's say that TIF has 10 holdings, so $10 worth of 10 different coins/tokens. If 5 of those tokens rise by 100% and the other 5 stay the same, the TIF would increase in value by 50%, thereby priced at $150. It simplfies the process for investors who want exposure but don't know how. And like I said, our work with TIFs is more of a bonus, not really tied to our core business. We are doing it because we have an established user base of financial institutions and finance professionals who want easy access to crypto, and need a way to do it. The trick is going to be letting those components of the TIF have actual usage.  HADE will be included in just about all TIFs to some degree, and we plan to have a lot. We may have a TIF of coins/tokens that raised more than $50 million in their ICOs (mainstream), and another of components that raised less than $10 million (under the radar), and then we may have others that primarily the big names like Ether, Litecoin, or Ripple.  In regards to HADE, it will be used as both a component and also for transaction fees among other things. There is a good chance we will have to do our own blockchain protocol, but those are questions we are answering right now.

Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: We have a team of nearly 40! Staff who have been working on this long before the ICO boom started. What you see is our leadership team. We a product already in place at HadePlatform.com that has more than 10,000 finance professionals and institutions. Because of our network, growing triple digits, we saw an opportunity for TIFs. So many people want in crypto but don’t know how.

Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: No airdrops.  We canceled the bounty. Hardly any advertising. We have paying customers who love our product. That’s 70% of our ICO. The rest is word of mouth.

Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market

The last thing we want is to pump our ICO or use some of the shady means that are all over the Web. We wanted to do the right, legal, and be able to use a point of reference in the future.

Author: cryptoeddy
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: HADE IS AN ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE POWERED SAAS PLATFORM FOR INVESTMENT RESEARCH, FINANCIAL INFORMATION ANALYTICS, AND THE CREATION OF TOKENIZED INVESTMENT FUNDS.   WEBSITE WHITE PAPER FACEBOOK TWITTER TELEGRAM MEDIUM HADE PLATFORM    What is HADE Token?  The HADE platform is an artificial intelligence platform SaaS platform for financial services and investment. The HADE token is a brainchild of the HADE platform. The HADE token is an ERC 20 token that is a tokenized representation of the tokenized investment funds, or TIFs run by the HADE Platform. This combines the security and confidentiality of blockchain technology with the financial services of a tokenized investment fund.  In the conventional investment markets, Companies like BlackRock with iShares and Vanguard have amassed trillions of dollars in assets under management by creating single investment products that give investors exposure to many stocks, also called ETFs. Many investors prefer ETFs for their diversification and increased safety profile vs owning just one stock.  The HADE platform seeks to bring such investment products for the cryptocurrencies markets through the TIFs. Unlike the conventional investment cryptocurrencies are somewhat restricted to trading and speculation. This is easy for the seasoned investors who can read the market. However, it locks out the vast majority of investors who do not have the skills or the time to read the markets. The future is the adoption of tokenized investment funds where investors can let experienced professionals invest the money on their behalf.  The HADE platfrom addresses this issue in two ways: i.   The Hade token will be used to license the technology that will facilitate the hosting and creation of the TIFs by investment managers. The technology will be sold on the Hade platform, and the only way to acquire it is using the Hade token. ii.   There will be additional TIFs made from other ERC20 tokens that will be sold on the Hade platform. Both types of TIFs will be available on other exchanges.    The team at HADE Technologies believe that tokenized investment funds, or TIFs, will completely change the crypto investment market as we know it. The team also believes that TIFs coupled with a simple buying process will result in record inflows of money to the crypto space. A single TIF could give an investor exposure to dozens of cryptocurrencies with one single product. Furthermore, the team believes TIFs could give owners access to the collective uses of each cryptocurrency held in a fund, thereby allowing a single TIF to serve the same functions as its components.  HADE TOKEN ICO  The HADE Token sales runs through to January 26 2018. Soft cap of $5 million already reached. Join and participate in the ICO to help the next generation Bloomberg with annual revenue of $6 million reach their Hard Cap.  ICO DETAILS   240 million tokens 120 million offered for sale $20 million market cap $10 million goal in ICO 1 ETH. = 5800  PARTICIPATE WITH ETHEREUM, BITCOIN, AND USD THROUGH JANUARY 26      For More information, Please visit our website and social media pages below   WEBSITE FACEBOOK TWITTER TELEGRAM MEDIUM HADE PLATFORM

Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: HADE is from HADE Technologies, an Orlando, FL USA based company. The tokens will be distributed within days after the sale ends on the 26, before February 1 and well before it lists to exchanges in early February.

Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: You still have time.... the 20% bonus ends today though. It goes down to 10%. There is also a referral link bonus of 10% for those who buy when the bonus is 20%, it also goes down to 5% for those who buy with the 10% bonus.

Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: You know what’s really great...... we are very close to making this become a reality, within months. And we already have a legitimate business creating revenue in addition to TIFs. We aren’t just “TIFs” or investment research for that matter. Our technology and platform applies to 6 different industries with an addressable market of $700 billion. If we can steal just 1% of that market share by undercutting prices and using breakthrough technology, that gives us $7 billion in revenue.

Author: HadeToken
Title: ANN[ICO] HADE TOKEN: Introducing cryptocurrency to a $700 billion market
Body: HADE is an ERC-20 token and will be used within TIFs and throughout our platform. However, we are also working on our own blockchain protocol with HADE Coin. We will not do another ICO for HADE Coin, but instead, will issue 1 for 1 to HADE token owners once we are done. HADE Coin will support the underlying technology and be used for transaction fees to support non ERC-20 token TIFs (those that include Bitcoin and other non alt-coins).
